question:
You saw an advertisement for a tennis course in England but you have one or two problems and can’t stay the whole course.

Write a letter to the course director. In your letter,

    explain your interest in the course
    describe your problems
    find out if a refund is possible
text: My name is Shekhar Chhabra last week I saw an advertisement for your tennis course in the newspaper. Firstly,I am very pleased to tell you playing tennis is my hobby and I felt very amazed when I get to know about the course you faculty starting in Shivnath Academy.Secondly, the place is near to where am currently residing and takes me a maximum of 10 minutes by foot.

Thus, I decided to enrol for the same and paid the fee for the course online using my debit card.However, I want to bring this to your notice that I would not be able to join the batch because of some serious issue.Unfortunately yesterday I met with an accident and got my left leg broken doctor suggested bed rest for at least 4 weeks.
Therefore, am seeking a full refund and I am sure you must have a money-back policy if do kindly let me know the procedure.
I hope you will understand my situation and will do the needful, waiting for your positive reply.
